entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Simcoe
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:40 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Delhi 2:00 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023
Temperature: -0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -1.6°C
Wind: ENE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023
